title: What Would A Drunk Do? (Do Opposite)
mechanism: META-STRATEGY: Model the behavior of an impulsive, emotional, overconfident bettor. Identify trades that 'look like' drunk/emotional bets (high leverage, round numbers, late night, small size, momentum chasing). Then do the OPPOSITE.

proposed_signal.condition: Trade has: leverage > 3 AND count < 10 AND (is_weekend_night OR price_just_moved)

novelty_vs_tested: S008/S009 tested drunk betting but were INVALIDATED. This refines the drunk profile
